Description.div:
Specify the customer information to be created, modified or deleted. CustomerKey or a combination of OrganizationCode and CustomerID can be specified to identify a customer.
If no customer matches the criteria.

BuyerOrganizationCode attribute must be passed when creating a customer representing an existing organization. If BuyerOrganizationCode is passed, the API will update the organization with information provided in BuyerOrganization element. If BuyerOrganizationCode is not passed, the API will create a new organization with information provided in BuyerOrganization element.
Organization does not exist.
If BuyerOrganizationCode attribute is not passed when creating a customer representing an existing organization.

Identifier for a customer. If CustomerID is not provided and Customer is a business customer, it will be defaulted as BuyerOrganizationCode. If CustomerID is not provided and Customer is a consumer customer, it will be defaulted as consumer's BillingPersonInfo's PersonID.

Type of customer. Valid values are: 01-Business, 02-Consumer. Default value is 01. If CustomerType is 01 , BuyerOrganization information is required and Consumer element will be ignored. If CustomerType is 02 , Consumer element is required and BuyerOrganization information will be ignored.
The maximum number of Teams or Users that this Customer can be assigned to. Only direct assignments to the Customer are taken into consideration to validate the maximum assignments.

Operation to perform
Valid Values:
Manage - Creates a new record if it does not exist, or modifies an existing record if it does.
Create - Creates a new record.
Modify - Change values in an existing record.
Delete - Deletes an existing record.
The default behavior is Manage .

Organization code of organization that defines this customer. Organization code is mandatory while creating a customer. Organization code is mandatory when modifying a customer, if the Customer Key is not passed.
OrganizationCode is not provided to create the customer.
OrganizationCode passed is not the Customer Master Organization.

Slot preference type of the customer. Valid values are: HARD - Only the preferred slots are to be considered. SOFT - Other slots will also be considered. NONE - No preferences. Default value: NONE
SlotPreferenceType is not a valid value.
SlotPreferenceType is NONE and CustomerSlotPreferenceList is passed.
Indicates the status of a customer. Valid values are: 10-Active, 20-On Hold, 30-Inactive.

Attribute.Name: SyncTS
Attribute.Description: The date and time the customer was synchronized with an external system. If attribute is passed in the input without a value, the attribute will be updated to system date and time.

Description.div:
The parent customer of this customer.
If ParentCustomer is provided, the following condition must be true.
It must be a valid existing customer.
It must be of the same CustomerType.
It must belong to the same organization as the child.

Identify the organization or node which customer represents. BuyerOrganization is required if customer is a business customer. If the Organization represented by BuyerOrganization already exists, pass BuyerOrganizationCode attribute with Customer.
If BuyerOrganization is not provided for creating the customer.

OrganizationCode which identifies an organization.
If OrganizationCode is not passed and Customer's Organization doesn't have an OrganizationSuffix.
Deprecated. See manageNodeNotification API. The number of days before which the ship node needs notification of an impending receipt or shipment.

Indicates if this node is a fulfillment node.
Valid Values: Y, N

Indicate if this node is a yard.
Valid Values: Y, N

Deprecated. See manageNodeNotification API. The number of days before which the communication to ship the order to the shipping node or supplier should be made. This field is used to determine the earliest ship date on the line.
Identify the consumer which customer represents. Either Consumer or CustomerContact is required if customer is a consumer customer.

Billing information of a consumer. BillingPersonInfo is required for a customer.
If BillingPersonInfo is not provided.

ID identifying a person information
If CustomerID is blank and PersonID is not provided.

Attribute.Name: Reset
Attribute.Description: Indicates if all existing child node definition in the database need to be deleted and replace with the provided child nodes.

Description.div:
Identify the preferred day of week and time slot that the customer would like to consider for appointment planning.
StartTime or EndTime is not passed.
Valid value is Delete or blank. If not provided the information will be created or modified.

Attribute.Name: OptimizationType
Attribute.Description: This value indicates indicates what scheduling will first optimize on, for this customer. If not specified scheduling rule will be used to determine optimization type.

Description.div:
The unique identifier for the customer contact. Defaults to UserID if not specified.
CustomerContactID and UserID are not specified.
Valid value is Delete or blank. If not provided the information will be created or modified.

Attribute.Name: Reset
Attribute.Description: Indicates if all existing child node definition in the database need to be deleted and replace with the provided child nodes.

Description.div:
Defines an additional address for a customer.
Pass either CustomerAdditionalAddressID or CustomerAdditionalAddressKey to modify an existing customer additional address reocrd, otherwise a new record will be created.
Attribute values in the PersonInfo element will be defaulted from CustomerContact if not passed in the input.
An address already exists as with either IsDefaultShipTo, IsDefaultBillTo, or IsDefaultSoldTo set as Y for this user and customer combination.
Valid value is Delete or blank. If not provided the information will be created or modified.

Attribute.Name: Reset
Attribute.Description: Indicates if all existing child node definition in the database need to be deleted and replace with the provided child nodes.

Element.Description: This table stores payment methods of a customer. Either CustomerPaymentMethodKey or a combination of PaymentType and its unique identifiers are required to identify a customer payment method.

Description.div: Valid value is Delete or blank. If not provided the information will be created or modified.

Reset flag clears all previously recorded notes and replaces them with the new notes passed in the input during this api call.
Valid Values: Y, N
Default Value: N
Valid value is Delete or blank. If not provided the information will be created or modified.

Indicates Display User's ID which is used for login in to the system. Ensure that OrganizationSuffix is populated for the Organization this User belongs to if this ID is being used across multiple Enterprises.

The table is used for storing answers.
If invalid authorization question is answered
If blank authorization answer is provided
If incorrect authorization answer is provided
If blank authorization question key and question text are provided
If there is no authorization question set up for the user.

Attribute.Name: Reset
Attribute.Description: Indicates if all existing child node definition in the database need to be deleted and replace with the provided child nodes.

Description.div:
Defines an additional address for a customer.
Pass either CustomerAdditionalAddressID or CustomerAdditionalAddressKey to modify an existing customer additional address reocrd, otherwise a new record will be created.
Attribute values in the PersonInfo element will be defaulted from CustomerContact if not passed in the input.
An address already exists as with either IsDefaultShipTo, IsDefaultBillTo, or IsDefaultSoldTo set as Y for this user and customer combination.
Valid value is Delete or blank. If not provided the information will be created or modified.

Attribute.Name: Reset
Attribute.Description: Indicates if all existing child node definition in the database need to be deleted and replace with the provided child nodes.

Element.Description: This table stores payment methods of a customer. Either CustomerPaymentMethodKey or a combination of PaymentType and its unique identifiers are required to identify a customer payment method.

Description.div: Valid value is Delete or blank. If not provided the information will be created or modified.
Specify Action = REMOVE to remove the entity. Leave Action blank or don't include it for modifying or creating a new entity.

The question type that this answer set is for.
QuestionType not passed.

Attribute.Name: Reset
Attribute.Description: Indicates if all existing child node definition in the database need to be scrapped and have only these definitions supplied in the XML.

Description.div: Specify Action = REMOVE to remove the entity. Leave Action blank or don't include it for modifying or creating a new entity.

The answer for the question.
AnswerValue passed should be a valid answer for the question it belongs to.

"Identifier for the question that this answer is for.
QuestionID should be valid.

Reset flag clears all previously recorded notes and replaces them with the new notes passed in the input during this api call.
Valid Values: Y, N
Default Value: N
Valid value is Delete or blank. If not provided the information will be created or modified.

Attribute.Name: Reset
Attribute.Description: Indicates if all existing child node definition in the database need to be deleted and replace with the provided child nodes.

Description.div:
Indicates if a currency is the default customer currency.
IsDefaultCurrency not passed.
Valid value is Delete or blank. If not provided the information will be created or modified.
